publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1905 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Sex Offenders (Notice Requirements) (Foreign Travel) (Scotland) Regulations 2001—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Sex Offenders (Notice Requirements) (Foreign Travel) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Iain Gray*

S1M-1905 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Sex Offenders (Notice Requirements) (Foreign Travel) (Scotland) Regulations 2001—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Sex Offenders (Notice Requirements) (Foreign Travel) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Iain Gray
